name: The Only One Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Warm & Sweet Gourmand.Key Notes:Citrus, Violet, Coffee.Fragrance Description:The Only One captures the essence of sophisticated and hypnotizing femininity..About the Fragrance:The Only Oneu2019s signature lies in the surprising combination of violet and coffee giving life to an enchanting floral scent. Like the woman it represents, the fragrance is an intricate play of opposites. It is from this fusion of the unexpected, a mocha violet note, that it draws its appeal.
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Alpha-. Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Citronellol, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Geraniol, Disodium Edta, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5), Bht.. . This ingredient list is updated regularly. We invite you to always read the ingredients listed on the packaging to ensure they are suitable for your personal use.

shades.shade_name: 1.6 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! I do also like The One. This does have a similar base smell as the one does (I have no idea what the base scent is). But, the rest of this smells different and itu2019s lovely. Very warm, sophisticated and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my all time favorite perfumes. Mixes warm and spicy so well. It is perfect for fall and winter. I really help theyu2019re not discontinuing it, itu2019s so hard to find lately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im on my 5th bottle of this perfume. This perfume lasts all day without being too overpowering. The opening is fresh and vibrant, but the dry-down is rich and warm with a beautiful blend of vanilla, coffee, and florals. Itu2019s one of those fragrances that leaves a lasting impression

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love spicy warm scents, this one is for you. For me it is quite strong so I only use 1-2 sprays. Lasts quite a long time on my skin. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells so good. but is more of a winter scent tbh so iu2019ll be using it during the winter and fall

reviews.review_title: Does not last, not a summer long lasting scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a scent that will last during the summer. When I first tried this on, loved it, it stayed not only on my skin but on my clothing, pretty much all day. As the weather got warmer in the NE, I sprayed generous amounts on and the moment I stepped outside, I smelled like nothing, even in a car full of people, it was completely gone. Really disappointed, but this is prly better worn in the winter, hopefully

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this, and I actually liked it when i first tried it on, but later it leaves sweat smell which i dont like at all. I purchased this because itu2019d be more spicy-floral smell. But not what I expected atat all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this I bought it a week ago and I fell in love with it itu2019s so sexy and warm great for winter/spring or like for a date night or just a girls night out and clubbing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so warm, sweet and cozy. A little goes a long way - as it can be over powering. More of a day time scent for me, but can also be worn at night. I love pairing it with the Madagascar vanilla perfume oil from Nest!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite perfume, but could last longer. Good as a winter scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my fav!!! Always get complements when I wear this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought mine in August and this is the result, I wear this everyday!

reviews.review_title: Longest lasting perfume Iu2019ve never used?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not the most unique perfume, kind of reminds me of black opium, but very beautiful and sweet. Iu2019m writing this review because of the staying power. I sprayed once on the inside of my wrist yesterday morning. Since then I have gone a full day, an hour long spin class this morning, and a shower. I can still smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a big pink bottle of Pepto-Bismol mixed with dark berries ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very pleasant, and I enjoy wearing it. It has a hint of citrus/violet, with powdery vanilla/coffee base that's not overpowering. Almost unisex.  It's fairly generic, but very easy to wear during the day. I wear this with jeans/hoodie. It doesn't last more than 2-3 hours on my skin.  I enjoy wearing this, but I wouldn't buy another bottle after this.

reviews.review_title: If you like SWEET hereu2019s your scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SWEET. Little girly sweet. This is nothing like the more sophisticated Black Opium. Could not smell the coffe. The dry down is okay if you can get past the caramel cotton candy opening. I couldnu2019t. Itu2019s fairly long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent and last all night on me. I wore it for my birthday in June as a blind buy and was pleasantly surprised!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is really warm& sexy perfect for a night out! It has strong vanilla notes. Iu2019m docking off a star because it doesnu2019t last as long as some of my armani perfumes, but still lasts for quite some time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: blind bought it because i generally love warm/spicy fragrances anyways and it def did not disappoint! smells lovely and lasts sooo long for me. sprayed it on in the afternoon, went to bed, and still smelled it the next morning! makes me feel all grown & sexy haha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just took it out of the box an hour ago & couldn't wait to write my review. It smells even better than I imagined though I don't get much coffee. It's very sweet, floral, & beautiful. Was also worried about it smelling TOO mature but I'm 27 (not 54) & it's perfect for me. I can't stop smelling my wrist & I can't wait for my boyfriend to smell it on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance. Itu2019s a sweet vanilla smell. If you like YSL Black Opium, you will like this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like chemicals, alcohol, and bitter coffee.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: No. Just no. This smelled like a can of raid exploded in a coffee factory. I returned it immediately. I donu2019t recommend buying this blind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this perfume from a friend and Iu2019m so happy I purchased this! So sexy and sweet but not too sweet. Its a good mix between fresh and sweet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this perfume when it first came out. I love this one because itu2019s sweet and sexy and lasts forever! Everyone, I mean EVERYONE compliments me whenever I put it on. I think it falls under the same category as La Vie Est Belle by Lancome in the sense that theyu2019re both sexy except everyone has that perfume and I not as many people have this one. Itu2019s so unique. If you wanna feel sexy, get it! Plus the u201cafter scentu201d or whatever is called is so so so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's so amazing. I love the smell of caramel and vanilla in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is good but unfortunately does not last long, i cant smell it anymore after about twenty minutes, so youu2019ll likely need to soak yourself in it. I do love the scent though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect dark sexy date night perfume ! Very seductive and expensive scent. I would totally buy again !

reviews.review_title: This is a sister perfume of u201c Burberry Her Intense
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It smells good but I feel like I had this sense before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I typically find sweet scents cloying and immature. But this! Itu2019s like drinking a good cup of coffee on a covered porch on a late spring morning, itu2019s lightly raining, and you donu2019t have anywhere you have to go because youu2019re on vacation u2014 itu2019s incredible. On me I mostly get the violet, iris, coffee, and caramel. I donu2019t find myself reaching for it often, but I love it every time I do.
Powerful yet sensual. Sexy & seductive. I love warm sweet garmounds. The base of vanilla & patchouli is what attracts me to this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like a sweet surgery goodness. Itu2019s warm, inviting and sensual, definitely a date night or a night out perfume. Iu2019m not a fan of D&G perfumes but Iu2019m impressed with this one, also I blind bought this based on the notes and good reviews which I was afraid of but they are spot on with this scent. Thanks ladies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent. it lasts all day long and is perfect for fall and winter months, but the sweetness also suits summer months. the warmness of caramel and coffee are so delicious, it is my favourite fragrance on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. Itu2019s sweeter than spicy in my opinion. However, you can buy Into the Night from Bath & Body for a similar scent for a fraction of the cost. Of course, this perfume will last more than Bath & Body, so itu2019s definitely better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this smells incredible. so sweet but also seductive, i fell in love with the scent when i tried it in store and had to buy it immediately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was torn between this and YSL Black Opium Eau de Parfum. After reading the reviews, I opted to go with D&G and I'm glad that I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s YSL black opiumu2019s rich aunt. Smells grown, sexy, and expensive. Serious confidence booster! I got so many compliments after I received this as a gift from my husband. Upfront you will get floral notes with a touch of vanilla base. Pretty basic but just wait until it dries! It will develop into coffee, chocolate, and the lightest bit of patchouli. Itu2019s sweet with a that little extra something. Later on itu2019s all smooth caramel and vanilla. Lasts most of the day for me but I totally see where people are saying youu2019ll need to reapply. This was made for the u201citu201d girl.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The title perfectly describes this. Youu2019ll really feel like, HER,  THE ONE, THAT LUX GIRL with this on lol The confidence boost that every girl should get when spraying her favorite perfume.

This perfume was a blind buy for me! I was interested in finding a new date night perfume and I enjoy vanilla notes- so I had to try this! Definitely happy with the scent! The only downside is the lasting power isn't as strong as I hoped. Overall if you enjoy vanilla and coffee notes- you will be happy with this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful very sweet scent, but doesnu2019t last at all unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely my favorite scent so far. Itu2019s basically Black Opium intensified, but with more caramel notes and less coffee. Very caramel and vanilla forward. Smells like a bakery. It certainly lasts longer than Black Opium for the same price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally in love, amazing fragrance and a beautiful bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was just walking around the Sephora store & a worker gave me a sample i smelt it and had to go back and ask which perfume this was. This smell is perfect for everyday!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells like a sophisticated sweet Carmel vanilla scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume doesnu2019t smell bad by any means but it definitely doesnu2019t wow me. It also smells exactlyyyy like those Rock Candies you get on a stick when youu2019re young. I wore it until the bottle was empty but itu2019s not something I would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful fragrance. Sweet but sophisticated. purchased the mini but will be going back for the full-size bottle. Hints of black opium but sweeter and more intense. Maybe the violets add a richer feel to the coffee, but I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone loved this scent on me my mom hugged me and was like you smell good what is that my boyfriend sniffed me all over. Itu2019s almost an older version of black opium less sugary but still sweet the citrus and coffee really balances it out. Beautiful scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its up my ally. If you've owned or smelled black opium ysl, it's very similar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I slept on this perfume for too long. It smells so good and a few sprays are long lasting. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely gourmand perfume. I wish it had better longevity and silage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my top 5 perfumes! Itu2019s sweet but mature.  It gives you the feeling of being warm and friendly and inviting (romantic even) but at the same time youu2019re a powerful woman who knows what she wants and has class. D&G makes the best perfumes. This one is hard to top. Itu2019s also sorta familiar to YSLu2019s Black Opium but better and with a longer lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For most of the year I gravitate toward fresh, aquatic, unisex scents. But in the fall, I'm always in the mood for something warm and slightly sweet. After so much searching for the perfect scent--sweet but not cloying, spicy, rich, a smidge boozy--i found it in this perfume. I am always really impressed with the longevity of D&G fragrances. This holds up all day long and into the night with no touch ups. I love that on me, the initially very sweet scent gets soft and warm as it dries down. Cozy is the best descriptor I can offer. I do get some very delicate spicy coffee notes after an hour or two, which I love. This is my new fall go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume & Black Opium by YSL are my absolute fave!  This scent is sweet & cozy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: hated the scent in the beginning. Sprayed it in store but put it in my basket anyway (it was the last one) walked for a bit then smelled my wrist and it was so sweet like sugary or caramel something along those lines. I LOVE THIS its my new go to for fall / winter its so warm sweet and comforting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very sweet and warm, I found it to be long lasting, with my body chemistry. I love deeper scents and I will probably use this to layer under scents that I find need a touch of sweetness added to them

Omg this is THE best perfume ever I saw it on TikTok and I blindly bought it online. After buying it I went in store I wasnu2019t sure if I like it but then when I got it in the mail and sprayed it on myself it is hands down the best perfume. Itu2019s so intoxicating and powerful! It smells cozy & sexy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered the sample size of this and just got it yesterday. This smells so amazing that I wish I would have bought a bigger size. You definitely need to buy this if you love gourmand scents! I promise this perfume wonu2019t disappoint you!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its funny how I bought this parfum for a friend and it is now one of my favorites!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my fall/winter fragrance of choice. Itu2019s warm and dark and sweet. Only need 1-2 sprays though, itu2019s strong! And it LASTS all day and I think it almost smells even better after a few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve worn u201cThe Oneu201d for over 12 years now and I wanted to branch out and try this scent! Honestly upon first spray I was not into this one at all! However as I let it settle I really started to enjoy it. Itu2019s very warm and sweet! Definitely give it a chance to settle. 1 to 2 sprays max!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: smells amazing and the lasting power is really good. i donu2019t pick up the coffee note, only caramel and florals. the combination is amazing! i think itu2019s a safe blind buy if you enjoy sweet gourmands

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I totally oversprayed this the first time I tried it and initially thought it was way too sweet and cloying. I kept reaching for it however and now it has grown on me. It is my favourite of the small collection of fragrances that I own. As it wears, the sweetness subsides somewhat and the powdery, spicy notes come out. It lasts quite long and lingers for days on my clothes and in my hair. It may be a bit too sweet and strong for work but I love wearing at home. Overall, a lovely sweet and comforting scent.

reviews.review_title: Does Not Smell Like Black Opium At All!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so disappointed!! I heard a lot of reviews that said this was similar to Black Opium from YSL  but with better lasting power, but it's not! Black Opium smells more like a dessert whereas this smells like super sweet artificial sugar mixed with baby powder. And I can't smell any coffee notes at all! The packaging is stunnning which makes this hurt that much more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is just beautiful. It is very warm and cozy. It smells a little sweeter upon dry down. A little goes a long way. Not super in your face and also not subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this fragrance, it is my go to for the fall and winter months. I get so many compliments whenever I wear it. It usually lasts at least 5 hours and smells just as delicious in the afternoon as it does in the morning. I love how itu2019s warm and sweet enough to wear to work yet sexy enough to wear out at night too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delicious. If you love warm, gourmand scents then this is for you. It's like Black Opiums older more sophisticated sister. This will be a forever scent in my rotation of favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good. Itu2019s a lot of the sweeter side and last the whole day. I wear it all the time and get lots of compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells amazing. Like YSL Black Opium with a fruity, caramel twist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells yummy. It does remind me of Black Opium but Black Opium is more sweeter. This one smalls like a more mature scent which i adore and love. the scent last on me for 5 hours. I love it. Definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This quickly ended up being one of my all time favorite scents. Itu2019s so feminine and sexy. I love it because itu2019s appropriate for daytime and evening in my opinion. Originally bought the travel size but quickly purchased the full size.

reviews.review_title: How to make this last longer?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the smell of this perfume. I find it very sweet and sexy but it also has a little musk or spice so itu2019s not cloying or cotton candy sweet. To me, itu2019s a more mature version of YSL Black Opium.   That being said, it doesnu2019t last on me at all! I can spray two or three sprays on in the morning and after my 10 minute drive to work, I can no longer smell it. Any tips on making this one last?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a while to really enjoy the scent. When it dries down it smells like caramel and coffee. It was my go to during Winter. The bottle itself is very nice and goes perfect in my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me of flower bomb and black opium.. too sweet/cotton candy/caramel smell on me. Also thought it was supposed to be long wearing, canu2019t smell it after an hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this! I smell so good I want to take myself out on a date!

Bought this because KathleenLights was raving about it. Opens like Jimmy Choo by Jimmy Choo, but dries down to something super unique. Love it only after it dries down thought :(, not from the get go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume made me feel sexy! The perfume on my body chemistry smelled of coffee and vanilla with a hint of musk. I wanted to like it sooo bad but unfortunately Imoff one I like strong perfumes and the staying power last 2-3hours max.  I got the travel size & Iu2019ll stick to just getting the travel size since I know I have to reapply every few hours .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This scent reminds me of Carmel candy, and a touch of salty beach air.  It doesnu2019t take much, lasted all day on me.  My new favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my cousin who had tried it on last summer (2020) and loved it so much. Iu2019m terrible at describing smells, all I can say is that it smells wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so delicious! It smells like a caramel macchiato with an extra pump of vanilla. If youu2019re not into sweet gourmand fragrances this isnu2019t for you. I would say that if you like u201cScandalu201d by JPG you would enjoy this fragrance - The Only One isnu2019t as pungent & sweet as scandal but they have the same vibe. Ladies your man will LOVE THIS FRAGRANCE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To me, this scent is a cross between YSL Black Opium and Lancome La Vie es belle. Warm, slightly spicy, a little sweet, a little floral. if you like those types of fragrances I think you would like this one. I think its lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Warm and beautiful! I donu2019t get the coffee note initially but the combination of violet and bergamot is surprising and lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: At first, I thought the smell was pretty good, but after wearing it a few hours the original smell disappeared and left only a sweet caramel smell. I mean, it literally smelled like candy! Not sexy, not good, candy! If only it wouldu2019ve kept that original smell, i might have tried it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the sample sample size with my last order. I will definitely be purchasing the full size bottle. This perfume wears well with outstanding lasting power. Its sweet but also spicy, my fav combo! So happy to have found another to add to my collection.

reviews.review_title: nice but much sweeter than expected
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this perfume is lovely, but definitely not what I was looking for. It supposed to be warm and spicy, citrus, and coffee --- but all im getting is sweet and floral. I really dont smell citrus or coffee. it is a warm sweet scent, but I wouldn't categorize as spicy. If you're into a sweeter fragrance, this might be for you! but not what I anticipated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am ga-ga over this scent! Itu2019s warm, sweet, and delicately complex. I donu2019t know exactly what it reminds me of, but I canu2019t stop wanting to breathe it in. Very nice lasting power, too. Almost catch hints of caramel and maybe even really subtle jasmine. Iu2019m smitten.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance! I was a bit worried at the first spray but after a few minutes when it dries down the scent is perfect for me. I donu2019t smell much coffee - I do get some spicy notes and sweet but itu2019s not overpowering. I personally wear this as an everyday scent but more for fall and winter. Great for date night or going out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received the mini size from rewards. I love the scent! It has a warm lingering scent that I havenu2019t smelled before. My only complaint is that about 1/2 of the bottle was gone when I opened the bubblewrap packaging it was shipped in. I think the lid should either be taped down or maybe shipped in a small box.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample with my points and I really dig it. I had previously gotten a sample of YSL Black Opium Neon, and I liked elements of it u2014 but there was something also off-putting, too sharp/irritating for my nose. This D&G has some similarities, but smoother. For whatever reason, it puts me in mind of a holiday party. I typically go for scents that are more daytime, everyday wear. This isnu2019t that for me. But I really like the smell, so I want to get the smallest one for special occasions. Itu2019s luxurious, itu2019s sexy, it feels rich... but it is a little heavy, so this might be a good u201ctry before you buyu201d scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really really like this one! Itu2019s not as u201cspicyu201d as Black Opium is and Iu2019m really liking that aspect. Black Opium was too cloying and make my nose itch with the spiciness of it but I did like the smell a lot. This gave that without it affecting my nose. I really enjoyed this scent but I donu2019t think I will use this as an everyday scent.

reviews.review_title: Very sweet gourmand, very little coffee, if any
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Warm, sweet, a little fruity? The coffee note is quite weak, so if that's what's bringing you by, this might not do it for you. Good staying power. A little cloying a la Prada Candy, but not quite so extreme. It's nice and I'll wear it on occasion, but it's not my new HG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this with my sephora points. The cap broke immediately but it was a mini size so it's no biggy. I was however hoping that this would smell more like coffee but it doesn't smell like coffee. I think maybe I just was craving coffee when I picked it. It has a unique and sophisticated scent. It's just a bit more mature than I am at the moment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting warm, floral, feminine scent. You do not need much either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this because reviewers who love Black Opium likes this too, and they were right!  I think it smells like the Laduru00e9e shop in Paris and it is my new favorite. I think black opium is a little bit sexier, and this one feels a little more appropriate for every day (and my husband actually prefers it).  I will definitely be buying a full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's sweet, sultry, but also light and floral. Obssessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The citrus in this was much more prominent than I was expecting. It mixed oddly with the coffee note. This perfume canu2019t decide if itu2019s a fresh and clean fragrance or a warm and comforting fragrance. The one violet floral note seemed too hidden. Itu2019s not a bad fragrance, but I probably wonu2019t buy the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like heavan on earth!!! It smells very caramel-esque and very warm and sweet. Iu2019m giving it four stars because it doesnu2019t have the most amazing longevity, but otherwise it fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t love this scent at first, but itu2019s definitely growing on me the more I wear it. Personally, itu2019s a little too u201cspicyu201d when first applied, but it really warms up just an hour or two into wear and smells so good. This lasts for so long, especially on my clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hmmm, this one is interesting in that it doesn't remind me of any other fragrance that I've ever tried. It's sweet, like sharply sweet and kind of tangy. There's something in it that is fruity and reminds me of a sour type of candy or something like that. It's hard to put my finger on it, but I suppose it's the Green Apple. I'm having a hard time deciding if I like it or not. I'm somewhere in the middle on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite perfume. My boyfriend LOVES it and I always get complimented on it wherever I go. It kind of smells like a sexy cotton candy (but an adult version, not too sweet). Iu2019ve gone through a couple bottles and I will always re-purchase!

reviews.review_title: It's the heaven in a scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume! Heavenly smell. Nothing else to say, it's the heaven in a bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is like a super candy sweet smell with coffee smell. it smells ok. If youu2019re into super sweet smells this is for you.

reviews.review_title: Youu2019ll be u201cThe Only Oneu201d who smells amazing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I wore this fragrance was on New Yearu2019s Eve at a late afternoon birthday lunch. I got so many compliments! Since I got so many compliments when I got ready for the NYE party I was attending that night, I decided to wear this fragrance. It was once again a great choice. This is a winter fragrance. Itu2019s warm with a mild sweetness that gives it a slightly seductive scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sweet scent and great staying power . It reminded me of the Ysl black opium I have in which is why I had returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It literally smells like Gobstoppers. Like the candy. Specifically the red ones. Anyways, itu2019s fantastic and men and their feeble boy minds love it. Probably because it smells like candy. However, itu2019s not an overpowering scent or a headachingly sweet, still soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: My favorite perfume is ysl black opium this is more on the sweeter side but man when I tell you I love it ! I also love how long it last itu2019s amazing !

reviews.review_title: The Sexy Aunt of Black Opium!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I watched Kathleenlights perfume collection and I went to purchase this and itu2019s amazing!! It feels a bit more bold and more sultry than the black opium perfume, kind of like its rich aunt. I swear there has to be candy apple in the notes because itu2019s what I smell all day and I love it! Itu2019s definitely amazing for the fall and winter and It feels very cozy. Definitely would recommend! Itu2019s also not crazy sweet and sweet enough. I saw someone said itu2019s very masculine like a man would wear it but I disagree, itu2019s very beautiful and bold and makes me feel very sexy and confident!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: smells more mature , for an older woman maybe. not horrible but not sweet enough for my taste!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect 27 year old scent. Smells beautiful. Mature but lovely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and was blown away! It smells so delicious, I couldnu2019t get enough of it. Itu2019s a sweet, warm scent. Not on the fruity side but very playful and light. I absolutely love it, will be purchasing a full size.

reviews.review_title: I was sold with a sample ...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so divine. I absolutely adore the marketing as a woman with duality, soft (floral notes) and strong (coffee notes). I find myself embodying the two. Iu2019m so happy that this was included in my purchase, even after I forgot to select my freebies. If it werenu2019t for that u201cgiftu201d I wouldnu2019t have found my sweet, strong and forever scent. Quando, quando, quando!
Lovely smell and lasts so long! I got a sample of this and will be purchasing the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to wear on my wedding day last year and have no regrets. Itu2019s my special occasions and date night perfume. My husband and I both LOVE it. Itu2019s definitely warm and sophisticated and lasts a long time. I donu2019t think Iu2019d necessarily recommend it for day wear, especially in the summer.  I also have a tendency to get headaches from a lot of perfumes but this one doesnu2019t.  Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For my skin chemistry, this fragrance smells a bit sweet and powdery. I think it could work as a day or evening scent. Medium longevity. The scent lasted about 4-6 hours on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS! The smell is subtle and sweet, lasts for most of the day. So happy with this perfume, definitely my new go-to:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my new favorite scent! it came as a sample and i fell in LOVE Not too sweet, with some good deep tones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is sickening sweet, it reminds me out that taste in your mouth before you throw up...I just bought it because Kathleen raves about it. Buy warm and cozy from pink it smells the exact same for a lot less, Iu2019m definitely returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I blind bought this during quarantine because of Kathleenlights recommendation and I am so lucky because I actually LOVE this perfume! It definitely reminds me of Black Opium, which I love as well but sometimes can be too much, the Only One is like a lighter, more everyday Black Opium. I also get Armani Si vibes from this. It's sweet but not too sweet, it's just perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only perfume that I buy. It smells like a grown up version of a perfume that I would wear in high school. The smell lasts all day on me and I even put a spray in my hair in it leaves my hair smelling like warm delicious coffee all day! 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely fell in love with scent in store! smells like a warm hug from an elegant woman and it doesn't hurt that my fav gal emilia clarke, is the face of this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because Kathleenlights recommended it and I always love her perfume recs. This smells AMAZING. The perfect combination of sweet, sexy, sultry, warm, spicy. I wear this usually when I am going out to dinner, it is the perfect romantic, fancy perfume. Will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this scent! Its sexy and sweet and it doesnt give me a headache.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ordered the perfume after sampling it thru my Sephora box subscription. Received a ton of compliments with this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent but doesnu2019t last more than an hour on me.... even when I spray a lot...might as well have saved some coins and bought body spray

reviews.review_title: itu2019s a showstopper & potential panty dropper.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: itu2019s honestly amazing. iu2019m a fan of the light blue and this one just won me over. it literally drives my man wild in the best way (:  s/n : got the sample in my sephora play box & ordering the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, Dolce & Gabbana never fails me with a perfume! I love the first one they came out with u201cThe Oneu201d. & they did not fail with this one!  Itu2019s such a beautiful, elegant fragrance! You will make people turn heads for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg just got this in my trial box for March and its divine!! Maybe my new favorite scent! Super warm and balanced. I get the violet scent the most with citrus in the back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the type of sweet, yet sophisticated fragrance that is right up my alley! This hits all my favorite gourmand notes like caramel, vanilla, and coffee- but also some of my favorite florals like iris, violet, and orange blossom. One of my favorite fragrances is YSL's Black Opium, and this seems much like a cousin to that scent. This is in the same family of Black Opium, but it's more soft and subtle. This doesn't have the awesome staying power of Black Opium for me, but it's still pretty good. I've had a ton of compliments on this from both men and women, so it seems like a solid crowed pleaser that doesn't offend many. Princess by Kilian has a similar effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is a GOOD one! iu2019ve never gotten so many compliments on how i smell after picking this one up. absolutely love it. stays smelling great ALL day! so bummed i didnu2019t get the biggest size available!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ALWAYS get compliments when I use this fragant perfume. It's perfectly sweet yet not overpowering. Bonus, a small spritz lasts the whole day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's DIVINE! I love it and my boyfriend asked...WHAT ARE YOU WEARING? YOU SMELL DELICIOUS!!! It's a sweet, spicy with a touch of floral smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg!! Was the reaction after smelling in on my wrist! I couldn't stop smelling my wrists. A beautiful warm and sweet smell!! If you like anything with a warm vanilla or cashmere type smell then this is for you!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, itu2019s warm yet still fresh! I just wish it was a little stronger, I find I canu2019t smell it anymore about an hour after I put it on

reviews.review_title: Head over heels on this scent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can only say ... this is wow. I got this in a sampler twice and wasnu2019t sure at first what to think of it.  The second sampler I found it alluring and then I realized it was actually a super, sexy scent.  I was able to get the fragrance saMpler and able to get the bigger size and glad I did.  It is amazing.  This is my first ever review for Sephora because honestly.. I donu2019t want it to go away. Keep the positives coming!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing! If you love sweet smells you will love this. Only downfall is the scent doesnu2019t last all day by mid day it starts wearing off which is a bummer because it smells so good. Still going to continue to buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I must have been through 100 scents over the past few years looking for something I feel like myself wearing, as if it was made for me. When I first smelled this in the store, I was immediately interested. I did not buy it at first, but I came back to it every time I visited a Sephora. I finally asked for a sample because the location was out of the travel spray (I like to actually wear a perfume for a few days before making a commitment to a larger bottle) and loved it so much, I ordered the largest size the next day (Sephora was having a rare sale - I usually only get the 1.7oz). The smell of violet is most detectable for me at the start (I am no scent expert so this might not be saying much), but as the day goes on, I can detect vanilla mixed in with the violet and this is exactly the scent I have been searching for. And it lasted all day on both my skin and clothing. To me, it is sweet enough and floral enough to be both sexy and feminine. I hate rose and powdery scents so this one is exactly opposite of that to me. If i imagined myself as a scent, this would be it. Also, I absolutely love the bottle. Nothing fancy, but so classy. The only problem is, after about 2 weeks of use, it suddenly no longer lasts. I don't know what this is about because I also have the travel spray and tried that to see if maybe I just got used to the smell, but the travel spray lasts even through till the next day and after a shower! I don't know if something changed in the large bottle somehow, but it literally loses the scent as it lands on my skin/clothing. I have no explanation - it was not in any direct sunlight or extreme temperature changes. I will see if I can maybe return this bottle and get a smaller bottle. Someone said that the larger quantities are not as good so we will see. I can't justify spending any price on something that doesn't even make it out the door!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Every one asks me what I have on. Three of my friends went out and got it after smelling it on me. Its very warm and sweet smelling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favourite perfume. After trying it in store I was immediately obsessed and I got it for my birthday. Itu2019s super sweet and Iu2019ve never had a perfume that has lasted this long. I like it better than my black opium perfume which is a similar scent. I recommend this product to anyone looking for a perfume that will stay on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. Smells sensual and sexy and warm and delicious. I canu2019t stop smelling myself. I wish this scent came in a candle, it would be perfect for bath time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfection in a bottle! Such a sexy scent and it is my go to winter perfume. Received a sample in an order and I had to buy the full size, which is saying something because I only one three perfumes in total that I consider my u201csignature scents.u201d Highly recommend buying the fragrances of 2019 set so you can get the full size for $65!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this because everyone compared to to black optimum I have to disagree this is super sweet almost like candy itu2019s not something I would go for but I received so many compliments so Iu2019m giving it a 4 stars if you like sweet candy scents then you would love this

I bought this because I have heard itu2019s very similar to black opium. Itu2019s a nice smell but I was slightly let down when I got it because I didnu2019t really smell the similarity to black opium. I donu2019t smell it as long, but it DOES smell good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such an amazing smelling perfume. Every time I wear someone asks me what I have one. It has a very warm and inviting yet sexy scent. This scent works really well with my body chemistry and last an incredibly long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m enjoying this new fragrance. Not overwhelming and Iu2019m enjoying this

reviews.review_title: goes from nice to dirty socks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this originally but it somehow does not work with my body chemistry. I started noticing that I kept smelling dirty socks. Kept putting it on, kept smelling dirty socks later until last week I was dying from embarrassment while in a meeting. I stopped wearing it and no more dirty socks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Silliness of the name aside (D

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Only One is the prefect blend of floral, citrus aromas with a warmth in the vanilla that isnu2019t overwhelming & a slight hint of coffee. I would definitely recommend this fragrance to anyone that is sensitive to perfumes. Most fragrances tend to make it difficult for me to breath and this isnu2019t so with The Only One. It has been my go to for autumn and winter. It is one of my signature scents and a favorite in my small collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Better than YSL Black Opium. Definitely my new go to Fall scent. Smells warm, cozy & delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looooove. Itu2019s definitely a sweet perfume but itu2019s a bit more mature. I get tons of compliments on it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is nauseating it smells like the womanu2019s bathroom at work not good I like the brand just not this scent . They have better fragrances sorry just not this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: as soon as i sprayed this on my skin i instantly wanted it off! this is a cheap knock off smelling version of black opium and has a nasty orange coffee scent. literally smells like u dipped a orange in chocolate and to me thats a no no unless u like something like that. i was really disappointed i am a perfume collector this was bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love smells like confidence and sexuality I layer it with another sweet scent and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful sweet yet sexy scent, similar to black opium by ysl but softer and a touch sweeter. Definitely my new fall scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im truly happy I bought the new Sephora Favorites Bundle of the New Perfumes that released in 2019. And Im a big fan of Dolce & Gabbanau2019s u2018Dolceu2019 u2018Light Blueu2019 so I was excited to try the latest scent new to the market and this one didnu2019t let me down. I think it smells very sexy and sultry, I like this for Date Night or when Im having alone time with my Boo. I would recommend anyone looking for a new scent to try, should go get a sample of it at Sephora and try it few days to see how it smells on you and decide. Im happy with this purchase. Im living for the packaging, its  heavy glass & it adds a beautiful look to my collection on display in my beauty room.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t care for this smell. To me it smells just like black opium with Black Opium smelling better than this. Just a nothing special scent. No staying power on me . Wore it for a week to work and I work around hundreds of employees and not the first compliment and most of the males are fast to compliment me when I smell great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample size of this with a previous order and LOVED it. It lasted forever, it had a sultry sweet smell and I got a lot of compliments. I loved it so much I bought the full size bottle the next week. I got the full size bottle and it was not as great as the sample... didn't last and the scent was slightly different. I was so disappointed because this stuff is not cheap. I tried it another day just to see and still was not satisfied. I went back to using the sample and loved it. I ordered another sample from another website and loved it too. Maybe this bottle was defective? Sadly, I ended up returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent, it smells so good. I couldnu2019t find anything that I liked better than my favorite perfume- YSL black opium, until I got a sample of this. Within an hour of putting on the sample I ordered the full size bottle. It has a bit of a sweet smell to it, but itu2019s also a little earthy; idk but it smells sexy- thatu2019s really the only way I can describe it. I will definitely be switching between this and black opium from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a sample with a mini-sized bottle and it was the cutest packaging ever. Then, when I smelled it, I just had to buy the full-size. I LOVE the smell, it's sweet, but it's not too strong. It's honestly the perfect strength for a perfume. I'll be alternating this with my YSL black opium and Bvlgari au the vert :).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a Sephora favorites fragrance sampler that could be redeemed for a full size bottle, and this was one of the scents included. If you're not one for flowery/powdery scents, give this one a try. It's got sweetness but it's balanced out by the coffee notes, and it dries down smelling like a deep, warm caramel. This is going to be my fall/winter scent, but I have a feeling I'll end up wearing it all year long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love the smell of this. It's so nice. so glad I picked this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best perfumes I have ever wore. I absolutely love this scent. I will be definitely buying myself this for Christmas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this with a purchase that I made and I think that this perfume smells good. Itu2019s strong though. I donu2019t think that is a negative for the majority of people that consistently wear perfume. I do not consistently wear perfume, but It makes a beautiful statement! I would definitely wear it on a date night with the hubby.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like Black Opium by YSL, you would like this, as it hits a lot of the the same notes. The sweet hits you first, then the floral. Heavy vanilla scent, I donu2019t really smell the patchouli at all. Itu2019s fine but not my favorite. I prefer Tom Ford scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample with my Tom Ford perfume & I ended up loving this sample more! It smells very vanilla-ey yet pretty. Itu2019s the type of perfume that catches peopleu2019s attention and now I want it so bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a sample and I'm goi g to buy it! It smells AMAZING! It's not overbearing, it's sweet, and long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting something more unique-smelling based in the description. If you like a spicy fragrance that is sweet, but not fruity this is a good one for you. It reminds me a tad of YSL Black Opium, but it REALLY smells a lot like Marc Jacobs Decadence. This one, however, has more staying power, so I'd pick this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells good however I am surprised nobody has mentioned it smells exactly like bath and body worksu2019 dark kiss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorites and a staple! I literally get compliments every time I wear this out. Great scent to wear year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reminds me so much of YSL Black Opium which I love! I am a perfume lover and use different ones depending on day, time, occasions, etc. This one I usually wear for date night as it is a sweet/sexy scent in my opinion. Lasts quite a while on me as well! Definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent!! Seriously was a great change from what I've worn before.

reviews.review_title: A Unique Creation of Familiar Notes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Only One is a perfect balance of the same kind of notes that are in YSL Black Opium

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. My bf made me get this bc he loved it on the spot. Lasts for a long time. Definitely make it a signature scent if you like sweet and hypnotizing fragrances.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, when I first tried this perfume at the store, I HATED it. I was immediately grossed out by this scent. I have no idea why. On another visit to the store, I decided to give it another shot. I am so glad I did. This is a gorgeous and unique scent! When I first spray it, it's definitely very strong but it dries quickly and you smell the beautiful notes of violet and coffee together. On my skin, the violent scent is very prominent which I love. It reminds me of a violet cologne my mother would put on me as a child. It carries a bit of nostalgia for me and just smells so good. I think this works as an every day scent. I love different types of perfumes but my collection has more floral and warm scents. It's so nice to see a perfume bring these two scent families together. I am saving up to get this bottle and I can't wait. I just used up the sample I got and I catch whiffs of the scent when I walk. Soooo gorgeous. I think it also works for warm weather since it has the floral component and isn't necessarily so heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume. Itu2019s sweet and feminine, a little bit fruity..but it has an edge to it. Itu2019s definitely not just gooey, sugary sweetness. Not cloying at all imo. Some people compare this to black opium and I think Black Opium and this smell very similar on paper but Black opium smells completely different than this on my skin. The only con I have is that it doesnu2019t last that long on me. Obviously I wish it did because itu2019s expensive and smells so good. It probably lasts 4 hours on me. Iu2019ll try putting aquaphor  where I spray it to see if that helps the longevity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my new favorite scent! I canu2019t stop wearing it. It honestly is a perfect mixture of La Vie Est Belle and back opium. I thought the two were on the extreme ends of the spectrum for me, but the only one hits it just right. This is going to be a staple, and I donu2019t see myself being without it. Ps. Love the patchouli in it, I think thatu2019s what makes me love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love. I thought The One was perfect but this scent is amazing. I know it should be more of a fall/winter scene but I love it.

reviews.review_title: Lasting vanilla woodsy with citrus floral
reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like ysl opium and black opium. Estee cinnabar etc any with spicy woody and alittle floral and vanilla I simply u2764ufe0f it. Now this D

reviews.review_title: lovely but I don't feel it lasts long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore Marc Jacobs Decadence, but it definitely is a winter scent. For spring and summer I usually wear Nirvana White but wanted something different, warm, and less floral but also nice in spring. This is such a lovely, unique scent. My husband really enjoys it as well. I just feel like I have to put my nose exactly where I spray it to be able to smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using YSL Black Opium as my daily fragrance for about three years now, this is definitely reminiscent of YSL BO but not so similar that it isn't worth trying out as well. To me it has a softer and fresher scent without losing the rich coffee gourmand base, making it a better option for the spring/summer. I believe this would be a universally flattering scent. The perfect balance of fruity, floral, and gourmand. When I first spray it on my skin I get a very strong powder scent which is not something I like in a perfume and thought initially I would end up returning this however, the powder scent goes away in a minute or two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is so sexy and complex. A coworker was wearing it this week and I had to ask her what it was because itu2019s so intoxicating. A couple of days later I went out to buy my own bottle. My coworker said it best: itu2019s like a lighter Black Opium, perfect for spring and summer. Itu2019s still got that gourmand scent but the fruity additions to this fragrance really lighten it up for the warmer months. At first spray itu2019s fruity, but you can still smell a bit of that vanilla coffee scent. As it wears throughout the day, it develops into more of a true gourmand but that fresh fruity scent still lingers, albeit subtly. On me I find both sillage and wear time excellent. I usually just do one spray on wrists as I am sensitive to scent and I find it to be enough. A couple bonuses to this fragrance: first, men love it. Second, the bottle is a beautiful addition to my vanity.

reviews.review_title: You have to smell it for yourself
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to find my go to perfume scent forever, and  since there are so many perfumes, each one I try I find something wrong with it- BUT this is a stunning scent. Iu2019m more of a citrus, fresh scent type of girl like the Marc Jacobs Daisy Perfume (the pink one) or the Calvin Klein Eternity Now Perfume, but there is just something different about this. This perfume lasts forever and it doesnu2019t give off the powdery vibe. The description of this scent is exactly what it smells like!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lasts long.  I usually canu2019t smell perfume on myself after I spray it but I could smell this on me during random times when I would move throughout the day.  At first I wasnu2019t sure how I felt about the scent but after using it the second/third day I decided I loved it.  It smells better on me when I spray it on my skin and not just on my clothes.

reviews.review_title: The only full size perfume I own
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite daily perfume. I only recently because a full fledged perfume addict, quickly building up a collection of dozens of tester sizes trying to find my signature scent. I love warm cozy scents, but am also sensitive so I prefer more subtle perfume. When I smelled this on my skin the first time I knew I had hit a the jackpot. I wore it all day and it just kept getting better- very subtle floral note surrounded by a warm coffee with vanilla. MMMMMMMM. I bought the full size the next day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a perfume collector. Many of the scents give me a headache and have an unpleasant sharpness to them.  This one is an exception.  Absolutely love it.  I was asked by a man recently what perfume I was wearing so he could buy it for his wife!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is literally the best thing Iu2019ve ever smelled. Itu2019s just the perfect scent and stays for a long time, without being too much. Worth the price? Probably not. Will I buy it anyway? Absolutely because Iu2019m obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells absolutely amazing. It has a warm scent to it that I really enjoy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved my sample from the Play! box

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. I received a sample and instantly fell in love with it. I cannot stand an overwhelming perfume and this one is just right!

reviews.review_title: Amazing scent that is sweet, soft, and alluring!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got to smell this the first time in an Ulta magazine sample and I fell in love right away! I was pleasantly surprised to get it in my February Play bag! I used the sample on and off to see if I liked wearing the scent on me and if it would work with my body chemistry and I am in love! I love warm, sweet, gourmand scents that are not too strong. This did remind me of YSL Black Opium which I think is a beautiful scent on others but it is too strong for me personally! So this is just right! In my opinion, The Only One smells more feminine and softer compared to Black Opium (too intense for me or for an everyday perfume imo) and other similar perfume DNAs. I enjoy the powdery scent when it dries down. The staying power is very impressive! It lasts on me until the evening and stays on my clothes too! I definitely recommend this if you like a gourmand scent that is not too intense or too sweet, and has a touch of elegance, allure, sophistication and comfort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the sample from my Sephora play box!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow..... this smells so good.  I wish it wasnu2019t so expensive because I want to buy the bottle!  But man it just really smells good... I donu2019t wear perfume often but with this, I just might!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unexpectedly, I really like this. It is very sweet and feminine but not on an overbearing way. It stays for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a fan of the warm and spicy sense, I went into Sephora wanting to get I warm and spicy perfume from Tom Ford. But once I smelled D & G the only one. I was sold. Itu2019s a nice lingering smell, not too much space but just enough. I smell more Amber than anything. Absolutely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loving the sample from my PLAY Box!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually like this scent. I have a signature perfume that I wear, so I'm probably not going to rush out and buy this, but it was a nice extra in my box this month

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not long lasting, the scent fades in a couple of hours after spraying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing, lasts long. Not overly sweet or fake candy smelling imo. Love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is quality perfume, as youu2019d expect from D&G. It was a lovely gift to me, but the scent is extremely sweet. Itu2019s like their other perfumes, but a touch more exotic. I gave it to my young adult daughter, and she adores it. If you like deeply sweet fragrances, this is a good choice. Long-lasting, too. Just not for my taste (fresh or unusual are my preference.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it but It soo super strong. Im not quite sure but its a heavy scent, my hub said its not bad. But glad I got the sample. The scent has heavy musk and it last long time.

reviews.review_title: Like Black Opium with a kick & longer wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is like YSL Black Opium but with a kick to it and it has longer staying power. This is definitely a new favorite of mine. I have been asked constantly throughout my day what heavenly scent I am wearing. As a gal who is not a fan of strong/floral scents, this smooth sweet and sexy scent is perfection in a bottle and is not overpowering which is important since I live in a beach climate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. It does smell similar to YSL Black Opium, which is one of my favorites... so maybe Iu2019m a bit biased. However it isnu2019t exactly the same. Itu2019s  a beautiful sweet scent, I love it! It also lasts longer than Black Opium for me, so thatu2019s a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This might be my new signature scent. It's beautiful, smells sweet yet sophisticated, drives the husband absolutely crazy must get more!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yet another overly sweet and syrupy gourmand in the same vein as Black Opium. If you like that, you will like this. As for me, neither are my cup of tea - or should I say coffee?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing scent! my new favourite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a perfect gift for a birthday or Christmas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning. The violet and iris meet the coffee notes in a perfect balance to create a slightly sweeter floral. As someone who loves iris and dislikes overly feminine scents, this is perfection.
